name: Domino Effect - DEMO
description:
This is the first game I made entirely on my own, in two month.

It has a lot of default. But it was intended to raise awereness around a sensitive topic. 

It hence has a few TW : Street harrassement, Anxiety attacks, swear words. 

You have to stay on the sidewalk as mush as possbile.

Follow me to keep you posted on every updates !
